name: family-todo-app
description: Family Todo App - MCP-powered task management for families

scripts.build: npm run build -w @family-todo/frontend && npm run build -w @family-todo/mcp
scripts.test: npm run test -w @family-todo/mcp && npm run test -w @family-todo/frontend
scripts.docker:test: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration.yaml run --rm runner npm test
scripts.docker:test:mcp: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration.yaml run --rm runner npm run test:mcp
scripts.docker:test:frontend: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration.yaml run --rm runner npm run test:frontend
